divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were sitting in our backyard when she asked what is that? i looked and saw four lights, two red on the inside two green on the outside all in a horizontal line.the object was motionless, just hovering. it quickly moved to the right,hesitated the moved back to the left. at this point it dropped suddenly the came back up there was no audible noise. it continued to make these types of movements and during this time kept moving away from us in a northern direction\ it did that until it was out of sight\we got in the car and drove about three miles and spotted an object we believed to be what we saw earlier we then went and talked to our local newspaper guy\ the object had moved west so it was now visable from our house\ the newspaper guy lives next to us and we pointed it out to him. he got his recorder and stayed on his porch while my wife and i drove west. at that point we observed the object for about five mjnutes. we went back to the neighbors house to see if he wanted to drive out with us and he declined. my wife and i went back at that point we saw six similar light configurations all in different directions. compared to what we saw once we drove outside of town. the similarity was the red and green lights and the fact that they appeared to be motionless except for slight movement horizontally and vertically. in conversations with people today i was told of a woman who lives in goliad which is 30 minutes from here who was levitated by an unknown object and another who sees objects move across her pasture frequently
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kenedy
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: seemed close hovered changed direction horizontily and vertically went away then up then down then up and moved north
